JobTitle: Senior Development Manager - Salesforce.com (Sales Cloud) - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: The Elevator Pitch: Why will you enjoy this new opportunity?VMware is transforming its offers along the lines of digital franchises focused on App Modernization, Multi-Cloud, Software Defined Networks, Security and Digital Workspace solutions. We are going through major transformation from product to solutions/SaaS offers and licensing model transition from Perpetual to Subscription & SaaS. These transformational changes are leading to large investments in applications and data ecosystem to enable new Routes to Market (RTM), improve Customer & Partner experience, and deliver efficient selling motion with insight driven monetization. We are looking for a passionate, business savvy engineering leader to drive IT Portfolio consisting of Sales (CRM) and Partner (PRM) domains. This is an opportunity to deliver top line focused impact and lead transformation on three dimensions – Scaling company to $20B+ enterprise, build & run application ecosystem for Subscription & SaaS business model and develop organization to be future ready. What is the primary need, technical challenge, and/or problem you will be responsible for? The primary focus is aimed at leading the digital transformation charge of the Sales and Partner IT application portfolio, accelerating our modern applications journey for VMware’s Global GTM teams. You will lead a global delivery organization to understand, rationalize and prioritize the application needs of the lines of business and deliver services that drive VMware’s growth and improve the company’s SaaS readiness.Build & support all automation capabilities for approximately ten thousand Sales Rep & Sales Managers/leaders and several hundred thousand Channel Partners Simplify and standardize our CRM and PRM platform implementation for scaling and optimizing the capabilities to be Subscription & SaaS business model ready.Modernize application ecosystem with dual focus on functionality and experience for customer, partner, and Sales Colleague.Align technology roadmap to business roadmap with measurable business outcomes. Champion and Implement VMware’s products’ internal usage as customer zero or One and create customer reference stories for VMware-on-VMware program. What type of work will you be doing? What assignments, requirements, or skills will you be performing on a regular basis?
